languages.text: "Простите, Лорд-капитан. Попытки связаться с кораблями неизвестных лишь зацикленно отсылают запросы на маячок беспилотника".

traits.locale_text: "Простите, Лорд-капитан. Попытки связаться с кораблями неизвестных лишь зацикленно отсылают запросы на маячок беспилотника".

languages.text: "Apologies, Lord Captain. Our attempted calls to the unknown pursuers' ships are being automatically relayed to the beacon on the pilotless vessel."
languages.original_text: "Простите, Лорд-капитан. Попытки связаться с кораблями неизвестных лишь зацикленно отсылают запросы на маячок беспилотника".

traits.locale_text: "Apologies, Lord Captain. Our attempted calls to the unknown pursuers' ships are being automatically relayed to the beacon on the pilotless vessel."
"Apologies, Lord Captain. Our attempted calls to the unknown pursuers' ships are being automatically relayed to the beacon on the pilotless vessel."
"Apologies, Lord Captain. Our attempted calls to the unknown pursuers' ships are being automatically relayed to the beacon on the pilotless vessel."
"Apologies, Lord Captain. Our attempted calls to the unknown pursuers' ships are being automatically relayed to the beacon on the pilotless vessel."

languages.text: “很抱歉，舰长大人。我们正在试图联系这些追击者，但所有信息都被对方自动转接到了无人驾驶的飞船上。”
languages.original_text: "Apologies, Lord Captain. Our attempted calls to the unknown pursuers' ships are being automatically relayed to the beacon on the pilotless vessel."

traits.locale_text: “很抱歉，舰长大人。我们正在试图联系这些追击者，但所有信息都被对方自动转接到了无人驾驶的飞船上。”

languages.text: «Lo lamento, Lord Capitán. Nuestros intentos de contactar con las naves de nuestros perseguidores se transfieren automáticamente a la baliza de la nave no tripulada».
languages.original_text: "Apologies, Lord Captain. Our attempted calls to the unknown pursuers' ships are being automatically relayed to the beacon on the pilotless vessel."

traits.locale_text: «Lo lamento, Lord Capitán. Nuestros intentos de contactar con las naves de nuestros perseguidores se transfieren automáticamente a la baliza de la nave no tripulada».

languages.text: 「申し訳ありません、ロード・キャプテン。謎の追跡者の船に通信を試みたために、無人船のビーコンに自動中継されているのです」
languages.original_text: "Apologies, Lord Captain. Our attempted calls to the unknown pursuers' ships are being automatically relayed to the beacon on the pilotless vessel."

traits.locale_text: 「申し訳ありません、ロード・キャプテン。謎の追跡者の船に通信を試みたために、無人船のビーコンに自動中継されているのです」

languages.text: « Pardonnez-moi, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais tous nos appels sont systématiquement renvoyés vers la balise de leur appareil autonome. »
languages.original_text: "Apologies, Lord Captain. Our attempted calls to the unknown pursuers' ships are being automatically relayed to the beacon on the pilotless vessel."

traits.locale_text: « Pardonnez-moi, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais tous nos appels sont systématiquement renvoyés vers la balise de leur appareil autonome. »

languages.text: "Verzeiht, Lord Captain. Unsere Kontaktversuche mit den Schiffen der unbekannten Verfolger werden automatisch zum Sender des unbemannten Schiffs geleitet."
languages.original_text: "Apologies, Lord Captain. Our attempted calls to the unknown pursuers' ships are being automatically relayed to the beacon on the pilotless vessel."

traits.locale_text: "Verzeiht, Lord Captain. Unsere Kontaktversuche mit den Schiffen der unbekannten Verfolger werden automatisch zum Sender des unbemannten Schiffs geleitet."

languages.text: "Bağışlayın Lord Kaptan. Ardımızdaki gemilere gönderdiğimiz çağrılar, otomatikman insansız vasıtanın vericisine yönlendiriliyor."
languages.original_text: "Apologies, Lord Captain. Our attempted calls to the unknown pursuers' ships are being automatically relayed to the beacon on the pilotless vessel."
